projects.title: Terminal Chat App
projects.description: Real-time messaging app with retro terminal interface
projects.tagline: Bringing back the golden age of terminal communication
projects.background: Inspired by early BBS systems and IRC clients, this project recreates the nostalgic experience of terminal-based communication with modern real-time capabilities.
projects.approach: Built using React for the frontend terminal interface, Node.js backend with Socket.io for real-time messaging, and implemented custom ASCII art rendering.
projects.challenges: Creating an authentic terminal feel while maintaining modern usability, implementing proper message threading, and ensuring cross-browser compatibility.
projects.outcome: Successfully deployed application with 100+ active users during demo period. Received positive feedback for authentic retro aesthetic.

projects.title: ASCII Art Generator
projects.description: Convert images to ASCII art with customizable parameters
projects.tagline: Transforming digital images into retro text art
projects.background: ASCII art has been a cornerstone of early computer graphics. This tool modernizes the conversion process while maintaining the charm of text-based imagery.
projects.approach: Implemented image processing algorithms using Python PIL, created web interface with Flask, and optimized for various ASCII character sets.
projects.challenges: Balancing detail preservation with ASCII limitations, optimizing processing speed for large images, and creating an intuitive user interface.
projects.outcome: Generated over 1000 ASCII artworks, integrated into multiple retro-themed projects, and featured in university tech showcase.

projects.title: Retro Game Engine
projects.background: Modern game engines often overcomplicate simple 2D game development. This engine focuses on pixel-perfect rendering and authentic retro game feel.
projects.approach: Developed in C++ using OpenGL for rendering and SDL2 for input handling. Implemented sprite batching, tile-based collision, and retro-style audio.
projects.challenges: Achieving pixel-perfect rendering across different screen resolutions, implementing efficient sprite batching, and maintaining 60fps performance.
projects.outcome: Currently in development with basic rendering and physics systems complete. Planning to release demo games showcasing engine capabilities.
